main event: A civilian observed a light in the NE sky that moved in various directions for 3 minutes and 30 seconds on May 29, 1966.
interesting points: The object appeared whitish with a hint of yellow, brighter than a star., The observer used binoculars to watch the object., The object was seen moving continuously and reportedly appeared to dim or fade away slowly., After the sighting, the observer felt it might have been moving at a tremendous speed before slowing down., The observer reported that the object had north-south wings about 20 feet long.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: A 19-year-old female who had an interest in UFOs.
